Container.Name: Deduper
Container.Overview: Deduper is a Python script bundled into a Docker container that automatically deletes any files with the same content, regardless of name. This is done based off of the SHA512 hash.
Container.Description: Deduper is a Python script bundled into a Docker container that automatically deletes any files with the same content, regardless of name. This is done based off of the SHA512 hash.

Config.Name: Scan Directory
Config.Description: This is where you put the directory that you would like to be scanned and deduped
